metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36373 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: When reading a specially crafted TAR archive an Apache Ant build can be made to allocate large amounts of memory that finally leads to an out of memory error, even for small inputs. This can be used to disrupt builds using Apache Ant. Apache Ant prior to 1.9.16 and 1.10.11 were affected.

criterions.comment: ant package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
